A version of '''[[Indev 0.31]]''' was released on '''February 1, 2010''' at 22:27 UTC.<ref group="note">The jar of this version is dated February 1, 2010 at 22:27 UTC.</ref><ref>[[wordofnotch:365736105|Minor update, must sleep.]] – [[The Word of Notch]], February 1, 2010</ref>

== Changes ==
=== Blocks ===
'''[[File:Bedrock JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Bedrock]]'''
* Hardness now equals -1.

'''[[File:Oak Log (UD) JE2.png|32px]] [[Log]]'''
* Now breaks faster than stone.

'''{{Animate|Coal Ore JE1 BE1.png; Iron Ore JE1 BE1.png; Gold Ore JE2 BE1.png; Diamond Ore JE1 BE1.png|32px}} [[Ore]]s'''
* Now need a [[pickaxe]] to break the block.
** No longer possible to mine ores without the correct tier pickaxe.
* Ores drop only 1 of their respective mineral when smelted or mined.

'''[[File:Sponge JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Sponge]]'''
* Now soaks up [[water spawner]] and [[lava spawner]] blocks.

'''[[File:Stone JE2 BE1.png|32px]] [[Stone]]'''
* Now need a [[pickaxe]] to break the block.
** No longer possible to mine stone without the correct tier pickaxe.

=== Items ===
'''{{Animate|Wooden Pickaxe JE1 BE1.png; Stone Pickaxe JE1 BE1.png; Iron Pickaxe JE2 BE1.png; Golden Pickaxe JE1.png; Diamond Pickaxe JE1 BE1.png|32px}} [[Pickaxe]]s'''
* Decreased mining speed of pickaxes.

'''[[Tool]]s'''
* Harder materials now require better tools.

=== General ===
'''General'''
* Sides of blocks are now rendered with the same dark shade in GUI, instead of one on the left being slightly lighter.

== Fixes ==
'''1 bug fixed'''
* Reverted bug fix with crashing the game during world generation offline from previous version.

== Bugs ==
'''2 bugs reported'''
* When generating a new level any grass block below flower turns into dirt.
* When inside non-solid blocks the fog appears within two block radius.
